metadata.title: golang: html/template: improper handling of special tags within script contexts (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Golang. The html/template package did not apply the proper rules for handling occurrences of "<script", "<!--", and "</script" within JS literals in <script> contexts. This issue may cause the template parser to improperly consider script contexts to be terminated early, causing actions to be improperly escaped.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
etcd is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
